channel.title: Strictly Come Dancing: Strictly Confidential
channel.description: Scott Mills & Amy Elizabeth share the latest backstage action on the UK’s favourite dance competition. Subscribe now for post-show reactions and exclusive interviews.
channel.itunes:summary: Scott Mills & Amy Elizabeth share the latest backstage action on the UK’s favourite dance competition. Subscribe now for post-show reactions and exclusive interviews.
channel.itunes:author: BBC Radio

item.title: Halloween Week is Coming....
item.description: Scott Mill's invites Amy Elizabeth over to hear just HOW excited they are for Halloween week, plus Head of Choreography Jason Gilkison and AJ Pritchard let us know what they really thought of the new Couple's Choice.
item.itunes:subtitle: AJ Pritchard's on the phone - did he enjoy Couple's Choice?
item.itunes:summary: Scott Mill's invites Amy Elizabeth over to hear just HOW excited they are for Halloween week, plus Head of Choreography Jason Gilkison and AJ Pritchard let us know what they really thought of the new Couple's Choice.
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio

item.title: Alfonso Ribeiro's Rules To Live By
item.description:
Tess Daly opens up direct from her dressing room, Guest Judge Alfonso Ribeiro's brings his dance floor (and life) advice and Production Designer Patrick Doherty explains how Strictly get the set to look THAT good!
Discover how taking part in Strictly is how Vick Hope is taking revenge on her Mum!
Hear just how ecstatic Amy Dowden and Danny John-Jules were after scoring the first ten of the series and we speak to Karen Clifton and Charles Venn whilst still on the dance floor!
item.itunes:subtitle: Tess Daly direct from her dressing room and set design secrets
item.itunes:summary:
Tess Daly opens up direct from her dressing room, Guest Judge Alfonso Ribeiro's brings his dance floor (and life) advice and Production Designer Patrick Doherty explains how Strictly get the set to look THAT good!
Discover how taking part in Strictly is how Vick Hope is taking revenge on her Mum!
Hear just how ecstatic Amy Dowden and Danny John-Jules were after scoring the first ten of the series and we speak to Karen Clifton and Charles Venn whilst still on the dance floor!
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio

item.title: Bring on Carlton!
item.description: Head of Choreography Jason Gilkison lets us know exactly what to expect in ‘Couples Choice’ and we are SO excited that Alfonso Ribeiro aka Carlton Banks, will be a guest Judge!
item.itunes:subtitle: Choreographer Jason Gilkison explains ‘Couples Choice’
item.itunes:summary: Head of Choreography Jason Gilkison lets us know exactly what to expect in ‘Couples Choice’ and we are SO excited that Alfonso Ribeiro aka Carlton Banks, will be a guest Judge!
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio

item.title: The Backstreet Boys are Tango, Salsa and Swing experts – who knew!
item.description:
The Backstreet Boys give Amy Elizabeth their advice for owning the dance floor and reveal some impressive talents whilst Aljaz Skorjanec and Scott Mills reminisce about their favourite Strictly tour moments.
Stacey Dooley confesses what she’s really like in rehearsals and how Kevin’s found the perfect way to calm her down, plus his parents Judy and Keith Clifton reveal what he was really like as a little boy…
item.itunes:subtitle: Aljaz Skorjanec and Scott reminisce about their favourite Strictly tour moments
item.itunes:summary:
The Backstreet Boys give Amy Elizabeth their advice for owning the dance floor and reveal some impressive talents whilst Aljaz Skorjanec and Scott Mills reminisce about their favourite Strictly tour moments.
Stacey Dooley confesses what she’s really like in rehearsals and how Kevin’s found the perfect way to calm her down, plus his parents Judy and Keith Clifton reveal what he was really like as a little boy…
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio

item.title: Kevin Clifton is taking priority over the Queen!
item.description: How did It Takes Two's Zoe Ball give Scott Mills his big break and why was his Mum furious with Craig Revel Horwood and Bruno Tonioli!
item.itunes:subtitle: How did It Takes Two's Zoe Ball give Scott Mills his big break?
item.itunes:summary: How did It Takes Two's Zoe Ball give Scott Mills his big break and why was his Mum furious with Craig Revel Horwood and Bruno Tonioli!
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio

item.title: Katie Piper's personal advice for conquering fears
item.description:
Vocalist Tommy Blaize explains the process of making a track suitable for Strictly and the considerations for preforming live every Saturday night.
Giovanni Pernice reveals a secret talent whilst rehearsing with Faye Tozer, whilst seconds after performing, Katya Jones explains how she created that mind blowing Matrix routine!
Martine McCutcheon gives her opinions on this weeks performances direct from the dance floor and talking from her dressing room, Katie Piper will inspire you all to take on a new skill!
Plus watching proudly in the crowd, Dr Ranj Singh's Mother and brother Jaz explain just how they found out he was going to take part!
Spoiler Alert: This podcast will address evictions.
item.itunes:subtitle: Katya's phenomenal choreography process explained plus how the band create each track
item.itunes:summary:
Vocalist Tommy Blaize explains the process of making a track suitable for Strictly and the considerations for preforming live every Saturday night.
Giovanni Pernice reveals a secret talent whilst rehearsing with Faye Tozer, whilst seconds after performing, Katya Jones explains how she created that mind blowing Matrix routine!
Martine McCutcheon gives her opinions on this weeks performances direct from the dance floor and talking from her dressing room, Katie Piper will inspire you all to take on a new skill!
Plus watching proudly in the crowd, Dr Ranj Singh's Mother and brother Jaz explain just how they found out he was going to take part!
Spoiler Alert: This podcast will address evictions.
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio

item.title: What really happens when you say goodbye...
item.description: As we lose our first contestant, learn what happens after the camera stop rolling - the goodbye dance, the disappointment and clearing out the dressing room!
item.itunes:subtitle: As we lose our first contestant, learn what happens after the camera stops rolling...
item.itunes:summary: As we lose our first contestant, learn what happens after the camera stop rolling - the goodbye dance, the disappointment and clearing out the dressing room!
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio

item.title: Who decided the celebrities for this series?
item.description:
Meet Talent Executive Stefania Alexandra, the lady who decides exactly who featured in this series.
Dianne Buswell confesses her secret weapon for keeping Joe Sugg focussed and AJ Pritchard doesn’t hold back with his life coaching skills.
Cricketer Jimmy Anderson reveals why he’s convinced Graeme Swann will win and Ashley Roberts’ Mum Peggy explains the one thing she warned her daughter not to do during the competition. Plus you HAVE to hear Comedian Romesh Ranganathan’s family description of the ballroom!
item.itunes:subtitle: Meet Talent Exec Stefania and why Cricketer Jimmy Anderson is convinced Graeme will win!
item.itunes:summary:
Meet Talent Executive Stefania Alexandra, the lady who decides exactly who featured in this series.
Dianne Buswell confesses her secret weapon for keeping Joe Sugg focussed and AJ Pritchard doesn’t hold back with his life coaching skills.
Cricketer Jimmy Anderson reveals why he’s convinced Graeme Swann will win and Ashley Roberts’ Mum Peggy explains the one thing she warned her daughter not to do during the competition. Plus you HAVE to hear Comedian Romesh Ranganathan’s family description of the ballroom!
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio

item.title: Their job was to do WHAT?
item.description: Amy Elizabeth pops over to Scott Mills' house to run through what we can expect on the first elimination night this Saturday! Warning – Scott admits to a genius way the make-up department kept him cool that will change the way you’ll look at Halloween week forever!
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott admits to a genius backstage make-up hack and secret jobs you never knew existed!
item.itunes:summary: Amy Elizabeth pops over to Scott Mills' house to run through what we can expect on the first elimination night this Saturday! Warning – Scott admits to a genius way the make-up department kept him cool that will change the way you’ll look at Halloween week forever!
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio

item.title: Getting to know Graziano and Zoella on why Joe is the braver Sugg
item.description:
Scott Mills and Amy Elizabeth welcome the Strictly Come Dancing Class of 2018! Hear what Joe Sugg’s sister Zoe (Zoella) really thinks of her younger brother taking to the dancefloor whilst Sheila Ryan (Lee Ryan’s Mum) explains why she was so surprised Lee was taking part!
Graziano Di Prima reveals which pro-dancer has been looking after him and why his nerves can be worse than his partner Vick Hope!
Katya Jones admits she’s ‘The Boss’ with Seann Walsh whilst he promises to keep his hair just as it is despite the advice of Head Judge Shirley Ballas.
Costume Designer Vicky Gill lets us into some dressing room secrets and after bouncing off stage Janette Manrara and Dr Ranj Singh will put the biggest smile on your face!
item.itunes:subtitle: Lee Ryan's two left feet and Seann Walsh is keeping his hair down!
item.itunes:summary:
Scott Mills and Amy Elizabeth welcome the Strictly Come Dancing Class of 2018! Hear what Joe Sugg’s sister Zoe (Zoella) really thinks of her younger brother taking to the dancefloor whilst Sheila Ryan (Lee Ryan’s Mum) explains why she was so surprised Lee was taking part!
Graziano Di Prima reveals which pro-dancer has been looking after him and why his nerves can be worse than his partner Vick Hope!
Katya Jones admits she’s ‘The Boss’ with Seann Walsh whilst he promises to keep his hair just as it is despite the advice of Head Judge Shirley Ballas.
Costume Designer Vicky Gill lets us into some dressing room secrets and after bouncing off stage Janette Manrara and Dr Ranj Singh will put the biggest smile on your face!
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio

item.title: Scott's House is Almost as Gorgeous
item.description:
What did you think of this year's Strictly Come Dancing pairings? From Scott's very own sofa, hear what Amy Elizabeth and Scott Mills are expecting from this year's contestants.
Get involved! We want to know what YOU want to see in this year’s Official Strictly podcast. Got a question for the contestants, pros or backstage team? Get in touch on @bbcstrictly.
Remember to subscribe so you don’t miss a single episode!

item.title: Hope They Get On!
item.description:
Whoa! Series 16 of Strictly has really started on a high and we've got exclusive backstage interviews straight from the dance floor.
Join Scott Mills and Amy Elizabeth as they discover exactly how the dancers are feeling before their pairings.
We also learn how Prince William made the collaboration of the night's performers Nile Rogers and Craig David happen.
Plus Stefflon Don’s tips for dressing on the dancefloor.
Get involved! We want to know what YOU want to see in this year’s Official Strictly podcast. Got a question for the contestants, pro’s or backstage team? Get in touch on @bbcstrictly or leave a comment below.
Remember to subscribe so you don’t miss a single episode.
item.itunes:subtitle: Strictly has really started on a high! We're backstage with interviews and more.
